Summary: three real bright lights in a triangle shape
divs: Sighting Detailsthe object was moving from the north to the south at a tremendous speed. it was not very high in the sky prob several hundred feet. there were no acq. lights blinking like an airplane..just the three bright lights in a triangle shape. I do believe it was a single object. as fast as it was moving there was no afterburner fire like a jet and there was no after noise as a plane would make. most of the planes here move from the west to the east. I called the local airport and they had already shut down their radar as had the airport in Shreveport, Louisiana. I called Barksdale AFB in Shreveport and i finally for a response and the officer who's name i didn't get told me that me that the base could neither confirm or deney my sighting. All i know is that the object was moving like a bat out of hell and there was no sound. I was out in the yard checking on a sick dog of mine. I noticed it because it is weird to see somthing flying from the north to the south here and at first i though it might be Careflight and i was wondering where it was going. It didn't scare me. I was excited to have seen it as it was the first flying object that I couldn't identify myself as I love planes and I know quite a lot about planes. I hope that it was the new F23 or a Stealth going to Barksdale, but of course they wouldn't tell me. I just wish the AFB would tell me that I actually did see something and they can't tell me what it was. As it is it is just my word against the world. I know i saw it; just wish someone would just tell me what it was or that they don't know what it was either. I'm more curius now, and I am going to watch the sky now even more that i have been. Thanks for having this site. Wish I had of had my phone camera with me. I will carry it with me all the time now. The part that really gets me is that there was no sound with it as it was moving so fast.
